translation.text: The mind is overflowing with the greasy dirt of egotistical pride.

melody.description: Gauri creates a mood where the listener is encouraged to strive harder in order to achieve an objective. This therefore creates the atmosphere where the listener is encouraged, but still prevented from becoming arrogant and self-important.

Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

text: ਧਨੁ ਓਇ ਭਗਤ ਜਿਨ ਤੁਮ ਸੰਗਿ ਹੇਤ ॥੧॥

translation.text: blessed are those devotees who are in love with You. ||1||

transliteration.text: dhan ōi bhagat jin tum sang hēt .1.

melody.description: Gauri creates a mood where the listener is encouraged to strive harder in order to achieve an objective. However, the encouragement given by the Raag does not allow the ego to increase. This therefore creates the atmosphere where the listener is encouraged, but still prevented from becoming arrogant and self-important.

author.author: Guru Arjan Dev
author.description:
Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

translation.text: Without the Naam, the Name of the Lord, how anyone find peace?

This therefore creates the atmosphere where the listener is encouraged, but still prevented from becoming arrogant and self-important.

text: ਰਸਨਾ ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮ ਜਸੁ ਕਹੀਐ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥

translation.text: With your tongue, chant the Praises of the Name of the Lord. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: rasanā rām nām jas kahīai .1. rahāu .

text: ਦਾਸ ਕੀ ਪੈਜ ਰਖੈ ਮੇਰੇ ਭਾਈ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥

translation.text: He protects the honor of His slave, O my Sibling of Destiny. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: dās kī paij rakhai mērē bhāī .1. rahāu .

melody.description: Gauri creates a mood where the listener is encouraged to strive harder in order to achieve an objective. text: ਆਗੈ ਆਪਿ ਇਹੁ ਥਾਨੁ ਵਸਿ ਜਾ ਕੈ ॥

translation.text: He alone exists hereafter; this place is in His Power.

text: ਆਠ ਪਹਰ ਮਨੁ ਹਰਿ ਕਉ ਜਾਪੈ ॥੨॥

translation.text: Twenty-four hours a day, O my mind, chant and meditate on the Lord. ||2||

transliteration.text: āth pahar man har kau jāpai .2.
